sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Row, Col, Button, Card, Toast, Input } from 'react-materialize' import Iframe from 'react-iframe' const SnippetView = ({styleSheet, snippetId, snippets, generateStyleSheet}) => { const div = { height: '33vh', width: '100%', padding: '5%', background: 'rgb(48,48,48)', border: '3px solid teal', color: 'white', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'scroll', } const bottomDiv = { height: '72vh', width: '100%', marginTop: '5%', background: 'white', border: '5px solid teal', color: 'white', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'scroll', resize: 'both', } const file = { background: 'orange', padding: '3px', color: 'white', } const hover = e => { e.target.style.background = 'rgb(59,151,136)' } const hoverEnd = e => { e.target.style.background = 'orange' } const clickLink = e => { } const foundSnippet = () => { let returnSnip = snippets.find(snip =>{ return snip.id === snippetId }) return returnSnip } const copyPasta = () => { const copyText = document.getElementById("copy-text"); copyText.select(); document.execCommand("copy") window.Materialize.toast('Copied!', 3000) } return (
HTML
{ (snippets.length>0) && foundSnippet().html }
CSS
{ (snippets.length>0) && foundSnippet().css }
) } export default SnippetView;
